description: This file is a command-line interface script for a universal project initializer tool. It defines argument parsing, configuration creation, and the main execution flow for initializing various project templates based on user inputs.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Holds configuration details for a project, such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Represents the type of project being initialized, with a method to interpret string input.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Encapsulates the logic for creating project templates and initializing projects.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains detailed information for initializing a project template, including commands, environment setup, files, and scripts.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with appropriate data types.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts relative paths to absolute paths based on a given base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes TemplateInitInfo into a dictionary, converting file paths to absolute paths.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a formatted JSON result indicating success or failure, with optional template info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main entry point that parses arguments, creates configuration, generates templates, and performs project initialization.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
